text: Domenico Bova (22 November 1946 – 9 July 2019) was an Italian politician who served as a Deputy between 1994 and 2006. ==References== Category:People from the Province of Reggio Calabria Category:2019 deaths Category:Deputies of Legislature XII of the Kingdom of Italy Category:Deputies of Legislature XIII of Italy Category:Deputies of Legislature XIV of Italy Category:Democratic Party of the Left politicians Category:Democrats of the Left politicians Category:1946 births
title: Domenico Bova
